title: OpenAI Expands ChatGPT’s Enterprise Data Access
description:
OpenAI ne ChatGPT ko enterprise data sources ke saath integrate karne ka option launch kiya hai.

Is update se businesses apne internal documents, CRM systems aur knowledge bases ko ChatGPT ke saath jod sakte hain.

Security aur privacy protocols ko bhi strengthen kiya gaya hai taaki sensitive data secure rahe.

title: Google Gemini Enterprise to Bring AI Agent to Every Desk
description:
Google Gemini Enterprise announce kiya gaya hai jisme AI agent har employee ke desk par available hoga.

Yeh multimodal model support karega text, image aur video inputs — jisse productivity boost hogi.

Organizations ko ab custom workflows aur internal automation banane ka mauka mil raha hai.

title: DeepMind Unveils Veo 3: AI Video Creator Goes Mainstream
description:
DeepMind ne Veo 3 model launch kiya hai jisme users bina editing skills ke 4K videos generate kar sakte hain.

Yeh model audio, animation aur visual effects automatically handle karega — creators ke liye game-changer.

Pricing aur availability ab announce kiye ja rahe hain, launch early 2026 plan kiya gaya hai.

title: NVIDIA and TSMC Begin Production of First Blackwell AI Chips
description:
NVIDIA aur TSMC ne Blackwell AI wafer production start kar diya hai — US domestic facility me.

Yeh advanced AI chips 2026 tak full scale production me aa jayenge, jo generative AI computing ke landscape ko badlenge.

Cost aur performance dono me major improvements expect kiye ja rahe hain.

title: XAI Grok-Imagine: Elon Musk’s Tool Can Generate Both Safe & NSFW Visuals
description:
xAI ne Grok-Imagine tool launch kiya hai jisme users text prompts se images aur videos generate kar sakte hain — including SFW aur NSFW content.

Yeh launch moderation aur consent questions ko bhi raise karta hai — safety frameworks ab focus me hain.

Creators aur regulators dono is innovation ko closely dekh rahe hain.
